BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE FRIENDS OF THE CABILDO INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SUPPORT THE LOUISIANA STATE MUSEUM PROGRAMS & SERVICES
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE LOUISIANA STATE MUSEUM BY PROVIDING FUNDS FOR EDUCATION, EXHIBITS, AND COLLECTIONS.
IRS990.Desc: VARIOUS PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO FURTHER THE MISSION OF AND PROVIDE SUPPORT TO THE LOUISIANA STATE MUSEUM BY SOLICITING DONATIONS AND VOLUNTEERS, DESIGNING AND PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES AND ORGANIZING FUNDRAISING EVENTS.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT THE OPERATIONS OF THE MUSEUM

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS COMPRISED OF MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ONLY VOTE ON BOARD MEMBERS' ELECTION AND OFFICERS' ELECTION AT THE ANNUAL MEETING CONDUCTED IN ACCORDANCE WITH ROBERT'S RULES OF ORDER. THE MEMBERSHIP ALSO HAS THE RIGHT TO REPEAL ANY BYLAW CHANGE MADE BY THE BOARD AT AN ANNUAL MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEETINGS ARE CONDUCTED PER RRO. REPLACEMENT OF BOARD MEMBERS AND REMOVAL OF BOARD MEMBERS IS BY A MAJORITY OF THOSE PRESENT. CHANGES IN BYLAWS AND TAKING MORE THAN 5% OF THE ENDOWMENT IS BY A 75% VOTE OF THE ENTIRE BOARD NOT JUST THOSE PRESENT AT A MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TREASURER AND OFFICE STAFF REVIEW THE FORM 990. ANY ISSUES ARE PRESENTED TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE BEFORE SIGN OFF BY THE TREASURER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HIRING IN KEY POSITIONS IS APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE CHIEF ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER RECEIVES ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEWS. THE REVIEWS ARE THEN DISCUSSED WITH THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND IT IS THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE, WITH INPUT FROM THE BUDGET COMMITTEE, THAT DETERMINES THE AMOUNT, IF ANY, THAT WILL BE GIVEN FOR RAISES. THE FULL BOARD VOTES AND APPROVES THE BUDGET, TO INCLUDE ANY RAISES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC BY REQUEST.
